name: Motor Gunter Fight - Racing Shooter
description:
Straight from Compton, start your death defying racing moto career on with extreme motorbike combat racing game. Play game, an ultimate 3D simulator game to shoot bike rival gangsters and thugs armored cars on fast motos highway.

Motor Gunter Fight - Racing Shooter Features:


-4 fastest armored heavy bikes with automatic weapons, guns unlimited ammo
-10 extreme killer and challenging shooting missions
-Realistic bullet fire effects and furious sounds
-Awesome urban areas and treacherous tracks and hilly ramps
